nodes.text: The Bynarria system was a star system that was located in the Lantillian sector, a part of the Kashyyyk Region of the Mid Rim. The system was the origin point of the Bynarrian jig dance, which was created by 1 BBY.
The Bynarria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square P-8.
